ARFM Webinar Series – Dr Arie Pagesti Aji
=========================================

by [shahidatulsadiah](https://fke.utm.my/author/shahidatulsadiah/ "Posts by shahidatulsadiah")
 | Jan 5, 2025 | [Anouncement](https://fke.utm.my/category/anouncement/)
, [FKESeminarSeries](https://fke.utm.my/category/fkeseminarseries/)
, [Postgraduate-info](https://fke.utm.my/category/postgraduate-info/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/arfm-seminat-resized-960x675.jpg)

Assalamualaikum and Salam Sejahtera,

All academic staff and students are cordially invited to attend a seminar organized by the Advanced RF and Microwave Research Group (ARFMRG) which is scheduled as follows:

Guest Speaker: Dr Arie Pagesti Aji  
Title: Terahertz Technology for Future Wireless Communications and Biomedical Application  
Date: 15 January 2025 (Wednesday)  
Time: 2:30 PM – 4:30 PM  
Webex meeting link: [THIS LINK](https://utm.webex.com/utm/j.php?MTID=m0ad20c8b96efbc5782c61b71e1bb465a)

We are looking forward to your participation. Thank you.

(CPD hour is awarded for staff, postgraduate students’ attendance will be recorded to fulfill the faculty’s requirement)
